main_topic.author: Kilaru Vasudeva
main_topic.title: Why do I get "Notebook Threw Exception", and with the same notebook, sometimes, I get a successful submission?
main_topic.content: I find it wierd. Is it any wrong code specification on myside or it is something on the kaggle backend?

comments.author: OminousDude
comments.content: Can I get some more info about this problem? It could be if you don't set a random seed something like a division by zero could occur.
